summary: Doctoral researcher at the University of Potsdam. Developed technical know-how in carbonate sedimentology and stratigraphy, specialized in non-marine carbonates. Robust field-work experience. Skillset integrated with numerous professional development courses. Looking to transition to the energy industry post-Ph.D.

position_groups:
[{'company': {'id': 1271, 'name': 'Shell', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C4D0BAQGN30g7aSl4NA/company-logo_400_400/0/1519856218579?e=1700092800&v=beta&t=HqIwwLBNmVKkXXiXnFVRbQwTX34PBz5TB2QZhtR3btU', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/shell/', 'employees': {'start': 10001, 'end': None}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 8, 'day': None, 'year': 2023}, 'end': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': None}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'The Hague, South Holland, Netherlands', 'date': {'start': {'month': 8, 'day': None, 'year': 2023}, 'end': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': None}}, 'company': 'Shell', 'description': None, 'title': 'Digital Carbonate Geoscientist', 'employment_type': 'Full-time'}]}, {'company': {'id': 30760, 'name': 'University of Potsdam', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C4E0BAQFN8xCiw0bmFg/company-logo_400_400/0/1641306467597?e=1700092800&v=beta&t=G1ic0rrGpMu1D4V0X0JczqKdkgN_bqqHbhtct-vo1Pw', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/school/university-of-potsdam/', 'employees': {'start': 1001, 'end': 5000}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 11, 'day': None, 'year': 2018}, 'end': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': None}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Potsdam Area, Germany', 'date': {'start': {'month': 11, 'day': None, 'year': 2018}, 'end': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': None}}, 'company': 'University of Potsdam', 'description': 'Sedimentological and stratigraphic characterization of a possible Pre-Salt analogue: the Yacoraite Formation (Maastrichtian-Danian, Salta Basin, Argentina).

Supervised by Prof. Dr. Maria Mutti, Dr. Sara Tomás and Dr. Gerd Winterleitner, Sedimentology Research Group / IRTG-StRATEGy graduate school.

Applied multidisciplinary approach integrating high-resolution sedimentological and stratigraphic studies with virtual outcrop modelling.
•	Measured 8 high-resolution stratigraphic logs (>2km) of the Yacoraite Fm.
•	Performed detailed lithofacies analysis (>350 thin section analysed) and facies mapping
•	Reconstructed facies associations and vertical and lateral heterogeneities
•	Interpreted the stratigraphic architecture of the Yacoraite Fm.
•	Developed a high-resolution depositional model and sequence stratigraphic framework

The methodologies applied in this project meet the standards of the industry for sedimentological and stratigraphic studies for carbonate reservoir characterization.

Selected for Internship in Equinor TPD R&T ET EXP STRATIGRAPHY & SEDIMENT (Bergen) - offer later terminated due to covid-19 pandemic.

Attended 17 professional development courses and workshops (see attached list).

Co-lead the field-trip “Outcrop Analogues for Atlantic Margin Lacustrine Carbonates” for Shell (1st-6th of May 2022), with Dr. Ali Jaffri (Applied Stratigraphix).

Co-lead the field school "Carbonate Platform Architecture" for Eni Master Geosciences for Energy (GEMS) (26th-30th June 2023), with Prof. Maria Mutti (University of Potsdam).

Awarded AAPG Foundation GIA “Horst & Jessie von Bandat” Memorial Grant (May 2021), AAPG Foundation GIA “Gordon I. Atwater” Memorial Grant (March 2020).

Paused from July-December 2022 (6 months), due to Internship in Shell Netherlands.', 'title': 'Researcher Ph.D. Student', 'employment_type': 'Full-time'}]}, {'company': {'id': 1271, 'name': 'Shell', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C4D0BAQGN30g7aSl4NA/company-logo_400_400/0/1519856218579?e=1700092800&v=beta&t=HqIwwLBNmVKkXXiXnFVRbQwTX34PBz5TB2QZhtR3btU', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/shell/', 'employees': {'start': 10001, 'end': None}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 7, 'day': None, 'year': 2022}, 'end': {'month': 12, 'day': None, 'year': 2022}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Den Haag ', 'date': {'start': {'month': 7, 'day': None, 'year': 2022}, 'end': {'month': 12, 'day': None, 'year': 2022}}, 'company': 'Shell', 'description': 'Internship as carbonate sedimentologist within the Specialist Geoscience Team, led by Dr. Andy Bell. Supporting a ‘Carbonate Knowledge Base’ project, underpinning HCCIP and V2V assessments and uncertainty analysis. Supporting the development of new tools and guidelines for carbonate evaluations.

Supervised by Dr. Erwin Adams, Dr. Richard Newport, and Dr. Luuk Kleipool.', 'title': 'Carbonate Sedimentologist Intern', 'employment_type': 'Internship'}]}]
